#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define dd double
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define mp(x,y) make_pair(x,y)
#define vi vector<ll>
#define pii pair<ll,ll>
#define vpi vector<pair<ll,ll> >
#define reset(a,b) memset(a,b,sizeof(a))
#define modu 1000000007
#define inf INT_MAX
#define fastio ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);cin.tie(NULL);cout.tie(NULL)
#define block 317

inline ll scan(){
    char c = getchar_unlocked();
    register ll x = 0;
    bool neg=false;
    if(c=='-'){
        neg=true;
    }
    while(c<'0'||c>'9'){
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    if(neg==false) return x;
    else if(neg==true) return -1*x;
}

ll dad[11234],wt[11234],n,has[1003];

ll findpapa(ll x){
	if(x!=dad[x]){
		dad[x]=findpapa(dad[x]);
	}
	return dad[x];
}

int main(){
	vi ans;ans.clear();
	register ll i,j,k,p,q,x,y,px,py;
	n=scan();q=n;
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
		wt[i]=1;dad[i]=i;has[i]=0;
	}
	while(q--){
		x=scan();y=scan();
		px=findpapa(x);py=findpapa(y);
		if(px!=py){
			if(wt[px]>=wt[py]){
				dad[py]=px;
				wt[px]+=wt[py];
			}else{
				dad[px]=py;
				wt[py]+=wt[px];
			}
		}
	}
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
		x=findpapa(i);
		if(has[x]==0){
			has[x]=1;
			ans.pb(wt[x]);
		}
	}
	cout<<ans.size()<<endl;
	sort(ans.begin(),ans.end());
	for(i=0;i<ans.size();i++){
		cout<<ans[i]<<" ";
	}
	return 0;
}
//9231656527
